page.title: 14BOARHILLS POPULATION
page.content: Although Boarhills was initially a farming settlement,many of the houses now belong to people who work in St.Andrews which is only three miles to the North East of Boarhills. As with all commuter villages, house prices tend to become rather inflated. This is because commuters enjoy the attractive setting of a rural village and yet, in the case of Boarhills, they have only a ten minute drive along quiet country roads to St. Andrews. Many of the commuters work in the University of St. Andrews.
